name: Super Oscar Runner
description:
Have you ever wondered how Super Oscar trains to be able to complete all amazing worlds?! Probably not! However this game will answer that question!

We are preparing a remastered version of Super Oscar for you to have fun again with many new surprises. We know, you can't wait and that's the reason why we have done this game!

In this game you will have to run through an infinite world avoiding obstacles and slimes(or of course smashing them!). Looks simple, well try it and prove you are the best Super Oscar trainer out there!

We hope you like it!
Make sure to rate the game if you are having fun :)
